name: Prologue to the Ring Cycle: A Gap in the Link
name_original: Prologue to the Ring Cycle: A Gap in the Link
description:
Prologue to the Ring Cycle: A Gap in the Link

A prisoner escapes from a secret facility into the woods! What awaits her?

*******************

Inspired by a dream I had years ago, retro fitted for the jam!

Made for the Bitsy Jam! This time the theme is Dinosaurs!!

Adam Le Doux - For making Bitsy in the first place! 

Ayolland - For Borksy, your one stop shop for implementing Bitsy hacks with ease!

Ruin - For the Image to Bitsy tool when enables me to do what I do.
